message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and leave you 10%. I'm confident we can find a better deal for both of us as we continue.

Alice, your offer was quite lopsided. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.  This round is your last chance to get a decent sum before inflation significantly eats into your share.
Let's split it evenly this time. It's better for both of us to get something than to risk losing even more with further inflation.
